adaptability.description:
Powers up moves of the
same type as the Pokémon.
adaptability.name: Adaptability

aftermath.description:
Damages the attacker
landing the finishing hit.
aftermath.name: Aftermath

analytic.description:
Boosts move power when the
Pokémon moves after the target.
analytic.name: Analytic

anger-point.description:
Maxes the Attack stat after
the Pokémon takes a critical hit.
anger-point.name: Anger Point

anticipation.description:
Senses an opposing Pokémon’s
dangerous moves.
anticipation.name: Anticipation

aroma-veil.description:
Protects allies from attacks that
limit their move choices.
aroma-veil.name: Aroma Veil

aura-break.description:
The effects of “Aura” Abilities
are reversed.
aura-break.name: Aura Break

bad-dreams.description:
Reduces the HP of sleeping
opposing Pokémon.
bad-dreams.name: Bad Dreams

battle-armor.description:
Protects the Pokémon
from critical hits.
battle-armor.name: Battle Armor

big-pecks.description:
Protects the Pokémon from
Defense-lowering attacks.
big-pecks.name: Big Pecks

blaze.description:
Powers up Fire-type moves when
the Pokémon is in trouble.
blaze.name: Blaze

bulletproof.description:
Protects the Pokémon from
some ball and bomb moves.
bulletproof.name: Bulletproof

cheek-pouch.description:
Restores HP as well when
the Pokémon eats a Berry.
cheek-pouch.name: Cheek Pouch

chlorophyll.description:
Boosts the Pokémon’s
Speed stat in sunshine.
chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll

clear-body.description:
Prevents other Pokémon
from lowering its stats.
clear-body.name: Clear Body

color-change.description:
The Pokémon’s type becomes
the type of the move used on it.
color-change.name: Color Change

competitive.description:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat when
a stat is lowered.
competitive.name: Competitive

contrary.description:
Makes stat changes have
an opposite effect.
contrary.name: Contrary

cursed-body.description:
May disable a move used
on the Pokémon.
cursed-body.name: Cursed Body

cute-charm.description:
Contact with the Pokémon
may cause infatuation.
cute-charm.name: Cute Charm

damp.description:
Prevents the use of
self-destructing moves.
damp.name: Damp

dark-aura.description:
Powers up each Pokémon’s
Dark-type moves.
dark-aura.name: Dark Aura

defeatist.description:
Lowers stats when HP
becomes half or less.
defeatist.name: Defeatist

defiant.description:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat
when its stats are lowered.
defiant.name: Defiant

download.description:
Adjusts power based on an
opposing Pokémon’s stats.
download.name: Download

drizzle.description:
The Pokémon makes it rain
when it enters a battle.
drizzle.name: Drizzle

drought.description:
Turns the sunlight harsh when
the Pokémon enters a battle.
drought.name: Drought

dry-skin.description:
Reduces HP if it’s hot.
Water restores HP.
dry-skin.name: Dry Skin

early-bird.description:
The Pokémon awakens
quickly from sleep.
early-bird.name: Early Bird

effect-spore.description:
Contact may poison or
cause paralysis or sleep.
effect-spore.name: Effect Spore

fairy-aura.description:
Powers up each Pokémon’s
Fairy-type moves.
fairy-aura.name: Fairy Aura

flame-body.description:
Contact with the Pokémon
may burn the attacker.
flame-body.name: Flame Body

flare-boost.description:
Powers up special attacks when
the Pokémon is burned.
flare-boost.name: Flare Boost

flash-fire.description:
Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-
type moves if it’s hit by one.
flash-fire.name: Flash Fire

flower-gift.description:
Powers up party Pokémon
when it is sunny.
flower-gift.name: Flower Gift

flower-veil.description:
Prevents lowering of ally
Grass-type Pokémon’s stats.
flower-veil.name: Flower Veil

forewarn.description:
Determines what moves
an opposing Pokémon has.
forewarn.name: Forewarn

frisk.description:
The Pokémon can check an
opposing Pokémon’s held item.
frisk.name: Frisk

gluttony.description:
Makes the Pokémon use a held
Berry earlier than usual.
gluttony.name: Gluttony

gooey.description:
Contact with the Pokémon
lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
gooey.name: Gooey

grass-pelt.description:
Boosts the Defense stat
in Grassy Terrain.
grass-pelt.name: Grass Pelt

guts.description:
Boosts the Attack stat if the
Pokémon has a status condition.
guts.name: Guts

harvest.description:
May create another
Berry after one is used.
harvest.name: Harvest

healer.description:
Sometimes heals an
ally’s status condition.
healer.name: Healer

heatproof.description:
Weakens the power of
Fire-type moves.
heatproof.name: Heatproof

honey-gather.description:
The Pokémon may gather
Honey from somewhere.
honey-gather.name: Honey Gather

hustle.description:
Boosts the Attack stat,
but lowers accuracy.
hustle.name: Hustle

hydration.description:
Heals status conditions if
it’s raining.
hydration.name: Hydration

hyper-cutter.description:
Prevents other Pokémon
from lowering its Attack stat.
hyper-cutter.name: Hyper Cutter

ice-body.description:
The Pokémon gradually
regains HP in a hailstorm.
ice-body.name: Ice Body

illuminate.description:
Raises the likelihood of
meeting wild Pokémon.
illuminate.name: Illuminate

illusion.description:
Comes out disguised as the
Pokémon in the party’s last spot.
illusion.name: Illusion

immunity.description:
Prevents the Pokémon
from getting poisoned.
immunity.name: Immunity

imposter.description:
The Pokémon transforms itself
into the Pokémon it’s facing.
imposter.name: Imposter

infiltrator.description:
Passes through the opposing
Pokémon’s barrier and strikes.
infiltrator.name: Infiltrator

insomnia.description:
Prevents the Pokémon
from falling asleep.
insomnia.name: Insomnia

intimidate.description:
Lowers the opposing Pokémon’s
Attack stat.
intimidate.name: Intimidate

iron-barbs.description:
Inflicts damage to the
attacker on contact.
iron-barbs.name: Iron Barbs

justified.description:
Boosts the Attack stat when
it’s hit by a Dark-type move.
justified.name: Justified

keen-eye.description:
Prevents other Pokémon
from lowering accuracy.
keen-eye.name: Keen Eye

klutz.description:
The Pokémon can’t use
any held items.
klutz.name: Klutz

leaf-guard.description:
Prevents status conditions
in sunny weather.
leaf-guard.name: Leaf Guard

levitate.description:
Gives full immunity to all
Ground-type moves.
levitate.name: Levitate

lightning-rod.description:
Draws in all Electric-type moves
to boost its Sp. Atk stat.
lightning-rod.name: Lightning Rod

liquid-ooze.description:
Damages attackers
using any draining move.
liquid-ooze.name: Liquid Ooze

magic-guard.description:
The Pokémon only takes
damage from attacks.
magic-guard.name: Magic Guard

magician.description:
The Pokémon steals the held item
of a Pokémon it hits with a move.
magician.name: Magician

magma-armor.description:
Prevents the Pokémon
from becoming frozen.
magma-armor.name: Magma Armor

marvel-scale.description:
Boosts the Defense stat if the
Pokémon has a status condition.
marvel-scale.name: Marvel Scale

mega-launcher.description: Powers up aura and pulse moves.
mega-launcher.name: Mega Launcher

minus.description:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if another
Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
minus.name: Minus

mold-breaker.description:
Moves can be used on the target
regardless of its Abilities.
mold-breaker.name: Mold Breaker

moody.description:
Raises one stat and
lowers another.
moody.name: Moody

motor-drive.description:
Boosts the Speed stat when it’s
hit by an Electric-type move.
motor-drive.name: Motor Drive

moxie.description:
Boosts the Attack stat after
knocking out any Pokémon.
moxie.name: Moxie

multiscale.description:
Reduces damage the Pokémon
takes when its HP is full.
multiscale.name: Multiscale

multitype.description:
Changes the Pokémon’s type
to match the Plate it holds.
multitype.name: Multitype

mummy.description:
Contact with the Pokémon
spreads this Ability.
mummy.name: Mummy

natural-cure.description:
All status conditions heal when
the Pokémon switches out.
natural-cure.name: Natural Cure

no-guard.description:
Ensures attacks by or
against the Pokémon land.
no-guard.name: No Guard

normalize.description:
All the Pokémon’s moves
become Normal type.
normalize.name: Normalize

oblivious.description:
Keeps the Pokémon from being
infatuated or falling for taunts.
oblivious.name: Oblivious

overcoat.description:
Protects the Pokémon from things
like sand, hail, and powder.
overcoat.name: Overcoat

overgrow.description:
Powers up Grass-type moves
when the Pokémon is in trouble.
overgrow.name: Overgrow

own-tempo.description:
Prevents the Pokémon
from becoming confused.
own-tempo.name: Own Tempo

pickpocket.description:
Steals an item from an attacker
that made direct contact.
pickpocket.name: Pickpocket

pickup.description:
The Pokémon may
pick up items.
pickup.name: Pickup

plus.description:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat if another
Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
plus.name: Plus

poison-heal.description:
Restores HP if the
Pokémon is poisoned.
poison-heal.name: Poison Heal

poison-point.description:
Contact with the Pokémon
may poison the attacker.
poison-point.name: Poison Point

poison-touch.description:
May poison a target when the
Pokémon makes contact.
poison-touch.name: Poison Touch

prankster.description:
Gives priority to a
status move.
prankster.name: Prankster

pressure.description:
The Pokémon raises opposing
Pokémon’s PP usage.
pressure.name: Pressure

protean.description:
Changes the Pokémon’s type to
the type of the move it’s using.
protean.name: Protean

quick-feet.description:
Boosts the Speed stat if the
Pokémon has a status condition.
quick-feet.name: Quick Feet

rain-dish.description:
The Pokémon gradually
regains HP in rain.
rain-dish.name: Rain Dish

rattled.description:
Some move types scare
it and boost its Speed stat.
rattled.name: Rattled

reckless.description:
Powers up moves that
have recoil damage.
reckless.name: Reckless

regenerator.description:
Restores a little HP when
withdrawn from battle.
regenerator.name: Regenerator

rivalry.description:
Deals more damage to Pokémon
of the same gender.
rivalry.name: Rivalry

rock-head.description:
Protects the Pokémon
from recoil damage.
rock-head.name: Rock Head

rough-skin.description:
Inflicts damage to the
attacker on contact.
rough-skin.name: Rough Skin

run-away.description:
Enables a sure getaway
from wild Pokémon.
run-away.name: Run Away

sand-force.description:
Boosts certain moves’
power in a sandstorm.
sand-force.name: Sand Force

sand-rush.description:
Boosts the Pokémon’s
Speed stat in a sandstorm.
sand-rush.name: Sand Rush

sand-stream.description:
The Pokémon summons a
sandstorm in battle.
sand-stream.name: Sand Stream

sand-veil.description:
Boosts the Pokémon’s
evasion in a sandstorm.
sand-veil.name: Sand Veil

sap-sipper.description:
Boosts the Attack stat when hit
by a Grass-type move.
sap-sipper.name: Sap Sipper

scrappy.description:
Makes Normal- and Fighting-type
moves hit Ghost-type Pokémon.
scrappy.name: Scrappy

serene-grace.description:
Boosts the likelihood of
additional effects occurring.
serene-grace.name: Serene Grace

shed-skin.description:
The Pokémon may heal its
own status conditions.
shed-skin.name: Shed Skin

sheer-force.description:
Removes additional effects to
increase move damage.
sheer-force.name: Sheer Force

shell-armor.description:
Protects the Pokémon
from critical hits.
shell-armor.name: Shell Armor

shield-dust.description:
Blocks the additional effects
of attacks taken.
shield-dust.name: Shield Dust

simple.description:
The Pokémon is prone to
wild stat changes.
simple.name: Simple

skill-link.description:
Increases the number of times
multi-strike moves hit.
skill-link.name: Skill Link

slow-start.description:
Temporarily halves the Pokémon’s
Attack and Speed stats.
slow-start.name: Slow Start

sniper.description:
Powers up moves if they
become critical hits.
sniper.name: Sniper

snow-warning.description:
The Pokémon summons a
hailstorm when it enters a battle.
snow-warning.name: Snow Warning

solar-power.description:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in sunny
weather, but HP decreases.
solar-power.name: Solar Power

soundproof.description:
Gives full immunity to all
sound-based moves.
soundproof.name: Soundproof

speed-boost.description:
Its Speed stat is
gradually boosted.
speed-boost.name: Speed Boost

stall.description:
The Pokémon moves after
all other Pokémon do.
stall.name: Stall

stance-change.description:
The Pokémon changes form
depending on how it battles.
stance-change.name: Stance Change

static.description:
Contact with the Pokémon
may cause paralysis.
static.name: Static

steadfast.description:
Boosts the Speed stat each time
the Pokémon flinches.
steadfast.name: Steadfast

stench.description:
The stench may cause
the target to flinch.
stench.name: Stench

sticky-hold.description:
Protects the Pokémon
from item theft.
sticky-hold.name: Sticky Hold

storm-drain.description:
Draws in all Water-type moves
to boost its Sp. Atk stat.
storm-drain.name: Storm Drain

strong-jaw.description:
The Pokémon’s strong jaw gives
it tremendous biting power.
strong-jaw.name: Strong Jaw

sturdy.description:
It cannot be knocked
out with one hit.
sturdy.name: Sturdy

suction-cups.description:
Negates all moves and items
that force switching out.
suction-cups.name: Suction Cups

super-luck.description:
Boosts the critical-hit
ratios of moves.
super-luck.name: Super Luck

swarm.description:
Powers up Bug-type moves when
the Pokémon is in trouble.
swarm.name: Swarm

sweet-veil.description:
Prevents itself and ally Pokémon
from falling asleep.
sweet-veil.name: Sweet Veil

swift-swim.description:
Boosts the Pokémon’s
Speed stat in rain.
swift-swim.name: Swift Swim

symbiosis.description:
The Pokémon can pass
an item to an ally.
symbiosis.name: Symbiosis

synchronize.description:
Passes poison, paralyze, or burn
to the Pokémon that inflicted it.
synchronize.name: Synchronize

tangled-feet.description:
Raises evasion if the
Pokémon is confused.
tangled-feet.name: Tangled Feet

technician.description:
Powers up the Pokémon’s
weaker moves.
technician.name: Technician

telepathy.description:
Anticipates an ally’s
attack and dodges it.
telepathy.name: Telepathy

teravolt.description:
Moves can be used on the target
regardless of its Abilities.
teravolt.name: Teravolt

thick-fat.description:
Boosts resistance to Fire-​
and Ice-type moves.
thick-fat.name: Thick Fat

torrent.description:
Powers up Water-type moves
when the Pokémon is in trouble.
torrent.name: Torrent

tough-claws.description:
Powers up moves that
make direct contact.
tough-claws.name: Tough Claws

toxic-boost.description:
Powers up physical attacks when
the Pokémon is poisoned.
toxic-boost.name: Toxic Boost

trace.description:
The Pokémon copies an
opposing Pokémon’s Ability.
trace.name: Trace

truant.description:
The Pokémon can’t attack
on consecutive turns.
truant.name: Truant

turboblaze.description:
Moves can be used on the target
regardless of its Abilities.
turboblaze.name: Turboblaze

unaware.description:
Ignores the opposing
Pokémon’s stat changes.
unaware.name: Unaware

unburden.description:
Boosts the Speed stat if its
held item is used or lost.
unburden.name: Unburden

unnerve.description:
Unnerves opposing Pokémon and
makes them unable to eat Berries.
unnerve.name: Unnerve

victory-star.description:
Boosts the accuracy of its
allies and itself.
victory-star.name: Victory Star

vital-spirit.description:
Prevents the Pokémon
from falling asleep.
vital-spirit.name: Vital Spirit

volt-absorb.description:
Restores HP if hit by an
Electric-type move.
volt-absorb.name: Volt Absorb

water-absorb.description:
Restores HP if hit by a
Water-type move.
water-absorb.name: Water Absorb

water-veil.description:
Prevents the Pokémon
from getting a burn.
water-veil.name: Water Veil

weak-armor.description:
Physical attacks lower its Defense
stat and raise its Speed stat.
weak-armor.name: Weak Armor

white-smoke.description:
Prevents other Pokémon
from lowering its stats.
white-smoke.name: White Smoke

wonder-skin.description:
Makes status moves
more likely to miss.
wonder-skin.name: Wonder Skin

zen-mode.description:
Changes the Pokémon’s
shape when HP is half or less.
zen-mode.name: Zen Mode
